scripts.lint: eslint --config eslintrc.json src/*.js && eslint --config eslintrc.json test/*.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-selection:d3,d3-parent:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-parent.js -- index.js && npm run lint
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-parent.js -c -m -o build/d3-parent.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-parent.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-parent.js build/d3-parent.min.js
